descriptions: Hotel is located near Tiantan Park, just a 10-minute walk from the National Center for the Performing Arts and Tian'anmen Square.
Hotel offers ultimate comfort and luxury. This 4-storied hotel is a beautiful combination of traditional grandeur and modern facilities.
Vela is located in beautiful Monteverde, famous for its rare and gorgeous cloud forest and friendly community.
Comfortable rooms and suites overlook lush gardens with panoramic views of the Arenal Volcano.
Each of the 210 modern guest rooms have wireless internet and satellite TV.
A private bathroom with shower, a TV, and free tea and coffee facilities are provided in each bright room.
